attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister is no longer trusted and no longer has the support of the majority of the British electorate.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Resign immediately."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page10809.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Resign/
